"She has older sister called Angela and younger brother called David."
"This California Girl was born on 25 October 1984."
"She’s the second child of three siblings. She has an older sister and a younger brother."
"She grew up in a very religious family with both parents being pastors."
"Her father (Keith Hudson) was an ex- groupie in the 1960s and her mother (Mary Perry) divorced her first Zimbabwean husband because of a \"stormy\" relationship."
"Katy owns a cat, creatively named Kitty Purry. "
"She began singing in the church choir, she started taking singing lessons and she enrolled at the Music Academy of the West for a while, where she studied Italian Opera - all at the age of nine!"
"She recorded her first album at the age of 15 under Christian record label, Red Hill. "
"Performing as Katy Hudson, she released this self-titled Christian-rock album in 2001. Sadly, because of Red Hill’s closure, this album failed before she could leave any impression."
"Katy says she met her boyfriend Russell Brand by throwing a bottle at him."
"Katy Hudson sounded too close to actress Kate Hudson, so she became Katy Perry instead, using her mother’s maiden name."
"She left home at the age of 17 to pursue her music career. She was signed by Island Def Jam Music Group and went to Los Angeles to work on a new album, which unfortunately never saw the light of day."
"In 2004 she signed with Columbia Records. She almost finished an album, but then they also dropped her...poor Katy! "
"In 2006, she starred in Gym Class Heroes’ music video for Cupid’s Chokehold in which she played the eventual love interest of the lead singer Travis McCoy."
"In early 2007 Katy was signed by Capitol Music where she began recording songs for her official mainstream album One of The Boys, which was released in 2008."
"The One of The Boys album's hit single, I Kissed a Girl was released in May 2008 and peaked at number one for seven weeks on the Billboard Hot 100."
"Katy and Gym Class Heroes lead singer, Travis McCoy, dated on and off for several years until they split for good in 2009."
"Katy was still dating Travis when she recorded the video for I Kissed a Girl. Travis also has a cameo in the video."
"Katy has landed the role of Smurfette in the Smurfs movie, due in 2011."
"Fans have taken to throwing cherry Chapstick at Katy when she performs I Kissed A Girl on stage."
"Katy says she was not allowed to listen to secular music as a child, and got into trouble one day for singing Alanis Morissette's Ironic in the school playground. "
"Early converts Blender Magazine named Katy as \"The Next Big Thing\" in October 2004."
"Katy is releasing her own perfume named... \"Purr\"."
"She appeared as herself in a 2008 episode of The Young and the Restless. "
"Katy nearly caused a glitter war when she tweeted that blasphemy as entertainment was \"cheap\" – referring to Lady Gaga's Alejandro video."
"She is a natural blonde."
"On December 1, 2010, Perry performed at the first ever Grammy Nominations Show, which aired on CBS."
"In March 2009, Perry blogged about being urinated on by a chimpanzee during a recent magazine photo shoot."
"Perry was rumored to be dating Benji Madden after the couple were spotted in Las Vegas together in February of 2009, however, Perry denied the rumors in a post on her blog stating \"Oh kittens! It's two pseudo famous people sitting next to each other, doesn't mean we were bumping uglies!\"."\
"Blog sites reported in late March of 2009, that Perry is dating singer Josh Groban."
"On January 16, 2009, an alleged photo of Perry nude in her bathroom appeared online. Publications from the Village Voice to Idolator argued that the photo is a fake."
"Katy Perry: \"I have a song out called 'I Kissed a Girl' [which features a line about cherry-flavored ChapStick]. If I want I could create a Katy Perry cherry ChapStick line...but I'm never going to hawk something that I don't believe in.\""
"Katy Perry has 'Jesus' tattooed on her left wrist. \"It's always going to be a part of me,\" she told EW. \"When I'm playing, it's staring right back at me, saying, 'Remember where you came from'.\""
"Whoopi Goldberg kissed Katy Perry on the lips after the singer performed on The View. \"I liked it,\" Goldberg told the audience."
"Her star sign is Scorpio."
"She was born in Santa Barbara, California."
"Her real name is Katheryn Elizabeth Hudson."
"Katy Perry admits Googling herself."
"While she’s all for flirting up a storm, she’s very selective about who she’ll plant a kiss on."
"Miss Perry is doing her bit for the environment and has stated on her MySpace page that while she is not a vegetarian she does drive a hybrid car."
"She knows she’s lucky to achieve what she has, referring to her top 3 'rock star' moments as eating dinner with Mick Jagger, having a release party for her album, and seeing a full-body tattoo of herself on a fan’s arm."
"Katy Perry: \"If you're presenting yourself with confidence, you can pull off pretty much anything.\""
"Her all time favourite artists are Beach Boys, Heart, Joni Mitchell, Paul Simon, Alanis Morissette, Imogen Heap, Gwen Stefani, and Rufus Wainwright, but she maintains Queen is her biggest influence."
"The girl deserves props for throwing herself face-first into a giant pink wedding style cake in front of her audience."
"She knows how to entertain her fans, in the past having appeared on stage as a Christmas tree, as well as ridden a giant lipgloss!"
"Katy had a continuing spat with Lily Allen for several months last year, sparked after Katy said that she was a \"skinnier version of Lily Allen\"."
"Forget about a garden or a castle, Katy and Russell got married in a Indian tiger sanctuary. No joke!"
"Russell also presented his bride with a ruby ring, which, according to AllieIsWired.com, \"he believes possesses protective powers.\" For the groom's gift, Katy gave him a baby elephant! (Try fitting that into a box!) Russell Brand Knew He'd Marry Katy Perry on First Date."
"There were 80 guests at the wedding, but, surprisingly, Katy's (former?) BFF Rihanna was a no-show."
"The night before they exchanged vows, the couple threw a Bollywood-themed bash and engaged in a traditional Mehndi ceremony where Katy's hands and feet were drawn on with henna. "
"Instead of a white wedding dress, Katy opted for a gray-colored Elie Saab Haute Couture gown, which she wore with a pair of $7,000 beaded satin heels, reports People"
